messages.subject: unknown kao on tsuba
messages.msgSnippet: Does anyone recognize this kao? Is is from a Nara or Mito tsuba. No mei, just signed with a kao. http://gcclearn.gcc.vccs.edu/stein/kao.jpg Thanks Rich ...
messages.messageBody:
Does anyone recognize this kao? Is is from
a Nara or Mito tsuba. No mei, just signed
with a kao.

http://gcclearn.gcc.vccs.edu/stein/kao.jpg

Thanks
Rich
